detaileddescription.para: Holds the numerical code of the event. For a list of all possible codes refer to `io.PcapEventCode`.
Holds the synchronization ID of the event. This field should be used for discarding of the events which have been delivered late due to scheduling [#f1]_.

briefdescription.para: This struct contains detailed information about the event occured on `io.Pcap` object.

detaileddescription.para: Pointer to the instance of this struct is the only argument passed to the subscribers of `io.Pcap.m_onPcapEvent`.
